summary: With this mod, training only costs 5 gold per time - all the time, with every trainer. You can also train up to 100 times, not just 5 times before levelling.
descriptionHtml:
With this mod, training only costs 5 gold per time - all the time, with every trainer. You can also train up to 100 times, not just 5 times
before levelling.

I have only increased the training level of one of the actual trainers - Faendal. So the other trainers will still train to Journeyman/Expert/Master level as before.
author: Shaedanna
